sentences.sContent: Since plants cannot locomote , the sensation of experiencing pain would be superfluous. Thus, plants differ completely physiologically from mammals.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since plants cannot locomote , the sensation of experiencing pain would be superfluous. Thus, plants differ completely physiologically from mammals.
sentences.sCn: 由于植物无法移动，它们不太需要具备感知痛苦的能力，因此，植物与哺乳动物在生理上全然不同。

sentences.sContent: In simulation, millions of robotic modules assemble to form a large cube robot able to locomote in many types of environments.
sentences.sContent_eng: In simulation, millions of robotic modules assemble to form a large cube robot able to locomote in many types of environments.
sentences.sCn: 在仿真方面，数以千计的机器人模块编译成一个可以在多种环境中移动的机器人。

words.tran: 火车头的；运动的；移动的
好旅行的人；有运动力之物；移动发动机
